{_blog_post_json.title}
Election Babble
{blog_bit}
_blog_post_body_many:
{_blog_post_json.title} by {_blog_post_json.author} on {_blog_post_json.datedash}
{_blog_post_body}
Go on
blog_bit: Starting strong with puns and a slight nod to the misadventures of the pilot from Hello Kitty Airways, this episode includes plenty of fails.
blog_more: On the flip side, there are also plenty of local events happening this month like the Saltaire Arts Trail on the 23rd to 25th of May, Bradford CoderDojo on the 23rd, Feral Vector on the 29th & 30th and Halifax Mini Maker Faire on the 30th & 31st so there should be something for everyone, hopefully. Join us as we watch Apple Watch say no-no to watch apps and tattoos, squabble a little bit about the new Windows browser, Microsoft Edge, which has surprisingly good emoji support, ramble on about how not to engineer a jet engine and other delicious security holes including a certain Password3 leaked via a signaller's control desk at Waterloo, on national television. Ooh and we've also a separate podcast about online voting if you're into that sort of thing.
